fields.description:
I am trying to partition data by a field of high cardinality (~75K). Is this even possible?
Tried different ways and it keeps failing. Even on very small sample data (12MB gzipped).
Below are queries and errors they throw. Anything I can do to work this out?


{noformat}
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS history_sample_hdfs(
  ts bigint,
  sp float, 
  cr float, 
  id string)
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED 
  FIELDS TERMINATED BY ',' 
STORED AS TEXTFILE
LOCATION '/history_sample';

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS history_sample_partitioned_hdfs(
  ts bigint,
  sp float, 
  cr float) PARTITIONED BY(id string)
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED 
  FIELDS TERMINATED BY ',' 
STORED AS TEXTFILE
LOCATION
  '/history_sample_partitioned/';
{noformat}


{noformat}
set hive.exec.dynamic.partition=true;  
set hive.exec.dynamic.partition.mode=nonstrict;  

SET hive.exec.max.dynamic.partitions=100000;
SET hive.exec.max.dynamic.partitions.pernode=100000;

set mapred.reduce.tasks=1000;

insert overwrite table history_sample_partitioned_hdfs
PARTITION(id)
select ts,  
sp,
cr,            
id
from history_sample_hdfs
distribute by id;
{noformat}


{noformat}
Vertex failed, vertexName=Reducer 2, vertexId=vertex_1513674323124_0019_5_01, diagnostics=[Task failed, taskId=task_1513674323124_0019_5_01_000000, diagnostics=[TaskAttempt 0 failed, info=[Error: Error while running task ( failure ) : attempt_1513674323124_0019_5_01_000000_0:java.lang.RuntimeException: org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.metadata.HiveException: Hive Runtime Error while processing row (tag=0) {"key":{},"value":{"_col0":1510399139699,"_col1":0.0,"_col2":360.0,"_col3":"367633640"}}
